Post a data request

Create and post a public request to collect data for your research.

Register to be a requester

Once published, this request will be stored in your solid pod (public/request.ttl)

Your requests

Please Note: This request form is structured using the Data Privacy Vocabulary (DPV). DPV provides terms (classes and properties) to describe and represent information related to processing of personal data based on established requirements such as GDPR.

Select the categores of personal data you are requesting
Authenticating (Secret Text, PIN Code,Password)
Knowledge and Beliefs (Thought, Religious Belief (special), Philosophical Belief (special))
Preference (Opinion, Interest, Favorite, Intention)
Demographic (Physical Trait, Income Bracket, Geographic)
Physical Characteristic (Gender, Age, Weight, Hair Color)
Behavioral (Attitude, Demeanor, Personality, Service Consumption Behavior)
Identifying (Biometric(special), Fingerprint(special), Retina(special), UID, Name, Picture)
Medical Health [Special] (Physical Health, Mental Health, DNA Code, Disability, Health History)
Sexual [Special] (Proclivitie, Sexual Preference, Sexual History, Fetish)
Ethnicity [Special] (Race, Ethnic Origin)
Language (Accent, Dialect)
Social Network (Friend, Association, Group Membership, Acquantaince, Connection)
Public Life (Political Affiliation (Special), Character, Religion(Special), Marital Status, Social Status)
Family (Family Structure, Divorce, Marriage, Parent, Sibling, Relationship)
Professional (Salary, Employment History, Work History, School, Professional Certification, Job)
Communication (Email Content, Social Media Communication, Voice Mail)
Criminal (Criminal Charge, Criminal Conviction, Criminal Pardon)
Financial Account (Financial Account, Payment Card, Account Identifier, Bank Account)
Transactional (Credit, Purchases and Spending Habit, Sale, Tax, Income)
Ownership (Car Owned, House Owned, Personal Possession)
Contact (Physical Address, Telephone Number, Email Address)
Location (GPS Coordinate, Country,
Device Based (IP Address, Device Software, Browser Fingerprint, MAC Address)
Life History
